statements.update:
update Oca_ServiceWorkOrder set
Id=#Id# CheckInTime=#CheckInTime# Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn=#OperatedOn# DataSource=#DataSource# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# WorkOrderNo=#WorkOrderNo# WorkOrderContent=#WorkOrderContent# ServeItemA=#ServeItemA# ServeItemB=#ServeItemB# ServeMode=#ServeMode# ServeRadius=#ServeRadius# ServeKeyword=#ServeKeyword# ServeType=#ServeType# ServeFee=#ServeFee# ServeFeeByGov=#ServeFeeByGov# ServeFeeBySelf=#ServeFeeBySelf# OtherCharges=#OtherCharges# OtherChargesFee=#OtherChargesFee# ServiceTimeRequired=#ServiceTimeRequired# RemarkRequired=#RemarkRequired# SuperviseTime=#SuperviseTime# SupervisedBy=#SupervisedBy# CallServiceId=#CallServiceId# OldManId=#OldManId# OldManName=#OldManName# Gender=#Gender# Address=#Address# LongitudeS=#LongitudeS# LatitudeS=#LatitudeS# Tel=#Tel# Mobile=#Mobile# ServeStationId=#ServeStationId# ServeStationName=#ServeStationName# ServeManName=#ServeManName# ServeManDispatchedTime=#ServeManDispatchedTime# ServeBeginTime=#ServeBeginTime# ServeEndTime=#ServeEndTime# InputtedTimeByServiceStation=#InputtedTimeByServiceStation# DoStatus=#DoStatus# ServeResult=#ServeResult# ServeResultRemark=#ServeResultRemark# FeedbackBy=#FeedbackBy# FeedbackToServiceStation=#FeedbackToServiceStation# FeedbackTimeToServiceStation=#FeedbackTimeToServiceStation# FeedbackRemarkToServiceStation=#FeedbackRemarkToServiceStation# FeedbackToOldMan=#FeedbackToOldMan# FeedbackTimeToOldMan=#FeedbackTimeToOldMan# FeedbackRemarkToOldMan=#FeedbackRemarkToOldMan# ServeManArriveTime=#ServeManArriveTime# ServeManLeaveTime=#ServeManLeaveTime# ServeFinalResult=#ServeFinalResult# ServeFinalResultRemark=#ServeFinalResultRemark# SpecialFlag=#SpecialFlag# ServeManId=#ServeManId#
where WorkOrderId=#WorkOrderId#
statements.delete:
delete Oca_ServiceWorkOrder
WorkOrderId=#WorkOrderId# Id=#Id# CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DataSource=#DataSource# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# WorkOrderNo=#WorkOrderNo# WorkOrderContent=#WorkOrderContent# ServeItemA=#ServeItemA# ServeItemB=#ServeItemB# ServiceTimeRequired<=to_date(#ServiceTimeRequired_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') RemarkRequired=#RemarkRequired# SuperviseTime>=to_date(#SuperviseTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd
